entry.title: Combined summary - Tree Chains
entry.summary: Peter Todd's tree chain idea, which was discussed in Let's Talk Bitcoin episode 104, has not been brought up in recent times and the reason for this is unclear. The technology was proposed as an alternative to raising the block size, but it is unknown whether any significant flaws were discovered. Interested individuals can find the original discussion on tree chains at https://letstalkbitcoin.com/ltb104-tree-chains-with-peter-todd/.
